Posts.Content: Are any of you ladies on Herceptin? i found taking that i was in agony with bone and muscle pain, my macmillan nurse told me to stop the Letrozole for a month and i found no difference to my pain, i stopped Herceptin over a year ago and i am now on Anastrozole  i still have bony pain but i think for me the side effects are better than Letrozole but the weight has piled in 2 stone in less than a year, but then again how much is that because i find it hurts to walk never mind exercise.
Posts.Title: Letrozole are dreadful
